inclusion.criterion: Healthy subjects aged from 6 months to 5years old of normal intelligence
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The subjects'guardians are able to understand and sign the informed consent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subjects established as healthy after medical history questioning,physical examination and clinical decision and in accordance with vaccination requirements of the experimental vaccine
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subjects who can comply with the requirements of the clinical trial program according to the researcher's views
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subjects who have never received group A, C polysaccharide meningococcal vaccine and type b haemophilus Influenzal vaccine
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Subjects with temperature <37°C on axillary setting
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Subject who has a medical history of Meningitis
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Subject that has a medical history of any of the following: allergies, seizures, epilepsy, encephalopathy history and so on
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Subject who is allergic with tetanus toxoid components
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Subject suffering from thrombocytopenia or other coagulation disorder may lead to contraindication to intramuscular injection
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Subject who has a history of allergic reactions
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Had received gamma globulin or immune globulin, in the past two weeks
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has a history of thrombocytopenia which may lead to contraindication to intramuscular injection. However, he was treated with plasma exchange and corticosteroids.
